title: macbook battery schematic
message: does any one have 2013 to 2015 macbook 13" retina battery schematic ? i have so many battery , battery cells are  good but circuit not good, i want fix all those , since those are original battery , or even macbook air battery schematic? i will figure out  , i know i can buy battery from ebay for 50-60 , but why , since i have original battery, i was able to fix battery changing a board , it worked like chump , i want to buy those board or get the schematic so that i can fix those

title: macbook battery schematic
message: There is nothing to fix. Most is the firmware locking the cells. Go buy UBRT if you really want to. But it is all to expensive, too much work and too little reward. Pointless.....
